full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @030B CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN MANG PO LA PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, DON YOD RDO RJE CHUNG BA'I SBYIN SREG GNYIS PA YID GTAN MI RUNG BA MANG DU SNANG BAS BTANG SNYOMS SU BZHAG CING, RTOG BDUN GYI 'GREL PA GNYIS SU DGRA NAG DANG DE'I SBYIN SREG DPAL 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA BZHIN MDOR BSDUS BSHAD PA LEGS PAR MTHONG NAS, DGRA NAG DANG DPAL 'DZIN GYI SBYIN SREG LA GZHI BYAS SBYIN SREG THAMS CAD KYI SPYI'I CHOG 'OD KYI SNYEMS KHA BSKANGS SHING GZHUNG GZHAN RNAMS NAS KYANG CUNG ZAD BLANGS TE, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS 'O DE GUNG RGYAL GYI LHA SHOL BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,
